content:
Yes, here are some helpful tricks to help you remember to bring your reusable bags and water bottle with you:

1. Use a visual reminder. Keep a sticky note on your front door or near your keys reminding you to grab your reusable items before you leave.

2. Keep your reusable bags and water bottle in a visible spot, such as by your front door, so you see them every time you leave the house.

3. Make it a habit. Try to make it a routine to grab your reusable items before you leave the house, and soon it will become second nature.

4. Keep extra reusable items in your car, so you always have a backup option if you forget to bring them with you.

5. Invest in reusable items that are compact and easy to carry around, such as a collapsible water bottle or a foldable grocery bag, making it easier to remember to bring them with you.
